description:
Gross operating surplus (share in turnover)

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
45341 Annual statistics of wholesale and retail trade
45342 Annual statistics: accommodation and food services

Definition:
Gross operating surplus is calculated as follows:

Gross operating surplus
= gross value added at factor cost
- gross remuneration
- payments for agency workers
- social security contributions

name: Gross operating surplus (share in turnover)
